detail.largeResponseWarning: Response is too large, content display is limited

settings.loginOptionalDescription: Login is optional. You can use MCP Router without an account, though some features may be limited.
settings.subscriptionDescription: View your current plan and subscription status.
settings.cloudSyncDescription: Sync your workspaces and servers across devices with end-to-end encryption.
settings.setPassphraseDescription: Set a passphrase to encrypt your data. This passphrase is required to decrypt your data on other devices.
settings.passphraseWarning: Remember this passphrase! There is no way to recover it.
settings.passphraseError: Incorrect passphrase. Failed to decrypt existing data.
settings.communityDescription: Join our Discord community to get support, share feedback, and connect with other users.
settings.feedbackDescription: Have feedback or suggestions? Let us know!
settings.loadExternalMCPConfigs: Load MCP configurations from external applications
settings.loadExternalMCPConfigsDescription: Allow MCP Router to import server configurations from other applications like Claude for Desktop
settings.analyticsDescription: Send anonymous usage data to help improve the app
settings.autoUpdateDescription: Automatically download and install app updates
settings.showWindowOnStartup: Show main window at system startup
settings.showWindowOnStartupDescription: Display MCP Router when your computer boots. Disable to start in the background.

mcpApps.title: MCP App Integrations
mcpApps.description: Manage MCP configuration for supported AI applications.
mcpApps.customAppDescription: Create a custom app integration with MCP Router.
mcpApps.configured: MCP Router is configured for this application.
mcpApps.notConfigured: MCP Router configuration is not set up for this application.
mcpApps.installRequired: Install this application to use MCP Router with it.
mcpApps.selectServers: Select which servers this app can access:
mcpApps.enterValidName: Please enter a valid app name
mcpApps.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this custom app? This action cannot be undone.

serverDetails.advancedConfigurationDescription: Configure advanced server settings including command, arguments, and environment variables
serverDetails.bearerTokenHelp: Authentication token used for secure access to the remote server.
serverDetails.toolsEmpty: This server has not reported any tools yet.
serverDetails.toolsRequireRunning: Start the server to view and manage its tools.

projects.projectSettingsDescription: Projects let you isolate the contexts where MCP servers are used.
projects.projectSettingsCliHint: To use the servers assigned to a project, run a command like: npx -y @mcp_router/cli connect --project <project-name>.

serverSettings.title: {{serverName}} Settings
serverSettings.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{serverName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

importFromJson.description: Import MCP servers from a JSON configuration file
importFromJson.errorInvalidJson: The provided input is not valid JSON.
importFromJson.errorEmptyMcpServers: The 'mcpServers' object must contain at least one server.
importFromJson.errorMissingCommand: Server '{{serverName}}' is missing the required 'command' field.
importFromJson.errorInvalidArgs: Server '{{serverName}}' has invalid 'args'. It must be an array.
importFromJson.errorFailedImport: Failed to import servers from JSON.

manual.errorFailedConnectRemote: Failed to connect to remote server.

remote.name: Remote Server
remote.description: Connect to a remote MCP server. For OAuth flows, we recommend using mcp-remote.

dxt.description: Import DXT file to import MCP server
dxt.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
dxt.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid DXT file

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
workspace.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All data in this workspace will be permanently deleted.
